name: Shapes of the color
description:
There is white in the shade of the color and white is the sum up of the colors.

This project's name is "Soul has no color."
.
Meaning: All the illusory thoughts we have are our perception of the world. Spirits do not belong to this synthetic world. According to metaphysics, we are all the same. 
.
No color, no shape, no form. This project brings the universality of spirits together in digital by using all colors, shapes, and forms.
.
While this project includes many dominant colors and sharp effects, it also explains that the spirit is not tied to any color or form with this distinction.
.
Each work contains a human emotion such as fear, love, and curiosity, etc.
.
When all the colors are combined, the color white appears.

When these works come together, nothingness like the soul exists.
